Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
com.university.player.inventory.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
The InventoryManager class is responsible for managing the player's inventory. It keeps track of items, as well as the number of spells and tools, and ensures the player cannot exceed the maximum limit for spells and tools.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InventoryManager()
    Constructs an InventoryManager with an empty inventory

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryManager

      public InventoryManager()
      Constructs an InventoryManager with an empty inventory

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(IItem item)
      Adds an item to the inventory Spells and tools are subject to their respective maximum limits
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add
      Returns:
      true if the item was added successfully, false if the item could not be added due to exceeding the maximum number of spells or tools

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(IItem item)
      Removes an item from the inventory Adjusts the spell or tool count accordingly if a spell or tool is removed
      Parameters:
      item - The item to remove
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully removed, false if the item was not in the inventory

    • getItemByName

      public IItem getItemByName(String itemName)
      Retrieves an item from the inventory by its name
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to find
      Returns:
      The item with the specified name, or null if the item is not found

    • getInventory

      public List<IItem> getInventory()
      Retrieves the current list of items in the inventory.
      Returns:
      The list of items in the inventory.
